Octostrap3 started because I really wanted to use Bootstrap while posting on my blog and all Octopress themes were based on Bootstrap 2.x.

Code & Contributing

For Octostrap3 issues, questions and pull requests check the GitHub repository.

The source of this blog is also available here. All the content on this blog is under a Creative Commons license CC-BY-4.0.

License

Just as Octopress Octostrap3 is under the MIT License.
